sources.title: Silent Valley (1935) TOM TYLER
sources.description:
FIRST TIME ON YOUTUBE!
Stars: Tom Tyler, Nancy Deshon, Wally Wales
Director: Bernard B. Ray

A sheriff tracking a gang of rustlers discovers that one of them is the brother of his fiance!

Tom Tyler (1903â€“1954) is best known for starring in B-Westerns from the silent and sound eras and for his lead role in the 1941 serial THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN MARVEL.

metadata.Plot: Sheriff Tom Hall is after cattle rustlers. When one of his deputies is killed, Farley gets Tom to replace him with his hired gunman Childers. When Tom catches one of the rustlers, Childers shoots him to keep him from talking. But Tom catches another rustler and this time gets the confession that Farley is the boss.
metadata.Writer: Carl Krusada, Rose Gordon, Jean George
metadata.Actors: Tom Tyler, Al Bridge, Nancy Deshon
